Description: Starter rig. Free at every station.
Mining rig. Build cargo grids and Synthetic Mining Lens.
Attack rig. Priority now is Salvaged Exotronics from Surveyors for parts. Autocannon's available with travel to a keep. Mid slot available for resistance buff or warp net.
Haul rig. Need crude matter fuel. T2/3 mining lenses and cutting lasers.
